thread.title: Raiders G.M.: We’ll welcome Aldon Smith when he’s reinstated
thread.title_full: Raiders G.M.: We’ll welcome Aldon Smith when he’s reinstated

author: Darin Gantt
title: Raiders G.M.: We’ll welcome Aldon Smith when he’s reinstated
text:
Feb 10, 2017 8:23 AM 
Mack, a motivated Smith & a star MlB …should make the D stand out!!! mball13 says: Feb 10, 2017 9:32 AM 
I know everyone Raider fan (myself included) can’t wait for Aldon to get back. However, I think the most important thing is that he is sober and his life is in order. As fans, we sometime forget that football is secondary to life, which goes well beyond any career. We should be pulling for him as a person, not a player. silvernblacksabbath says: Feb 10, 2017 9:37 AM 
“The QB must go down and he must go down hard” -Al Feb 10, 2017 9:46 AM 
When does Greg Hardy’s plane touchdown! Commitment to Character! jimnaizeeum says: Feb 10, 2017 9:51 AM 
silvernblacksabbath says: “The QB must go down and he must go down hard” -Al 
Like Derek Carr? Feb 10, 2017 9:57 AM 
And when he returns they are all gonna do the Twist Feb 10, 2017 10:08 AM 
We’ll welcome him until he gets suspended again. hanspard says: Feb 10, 2017 10:15 AM 
Perfect spot for him. The Raiders can certainly use him, but with Mack and Irvin they don’t fall apart if he’s gone. Hopefully he can keep it together. redlikethepig says: Feb 10, 2017 10:16 AM 
Can Joe Mixon be far behind? ricko1112 says: Feb 10, 2017 10:47 AM 
Come on! You all know he’s going to do something stupid this offseason to get suspended again. It’s in his nature… Feb 10, 2017 10:50 AM 
redlikethepig says: Feb 10, 2017 10:16 AM Can Joe Mixon be far behind? 
– twoteamsforlosangeles says: Feb 10, 2017 11:25 AM 
Well, Reggie, given Roger’s hate for the Raiders, you’d probably have to be 2-12 in entering week 15 for Jolly Roger to reinstate him. $10 says that he would have been reinstated if your team was eliminated from playoff contention. kcraiderdan says: Feb 10, 2017 11:48 AM 
redlikethepig says: Feb 10, 2017 10:16 AM 
Can Joe Mixon be far behind?
